item.description:
Hello, hello, hello.
It's the first Thursday of the month and time to take the forth off a couple, this time at The Burren (7pm onwards). Good beer, decent pub grub (especially the Shepherd's Pie), good craic (chat).

I'll be entertaining my folks from Newcastle (the original version) so come along to hear some really odd accents.

Cheers,
Steve O.
item.how_to_find_us: Call my cell 978-289-2364 if you need directions

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Thirsty First Thursday - The Burren, Davis Square
